ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: Well belated Happy Birthday!! luv, -Su I just turned 48 yesterday and my wife is 40. ... From: Steven R. Hulse To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Sunday, July
ygData.messageBody:
Well belated Happy Birthday!!
luv,
-Su

I just turned 48 yesterday and my wife is 40.
----- Original Message -----
From: Steven R. Hulse
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, July 28, 2002 9:12 PM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543


If you don't mind me asking, How old are you two? The reason I ask is I
would be curious as to what some of the ages people are who play. Since
you mentioned your "retired" that really got me to wondering. ;-)

-----Original Message-----
Message: 6
Date: Sun, 28 Jul 2002 11:13:58 -0500
From: "Orion" <orionv@...>
Subject: Re: Re: bazaar

My wife and I are both retired and play a lot. We have no life so that
makes it even easier....:> Hey it keeps us out of trouble..hehehe
